edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class Conditions

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.Conditions

public class Conditions
extends Object

Condition constants and helper methods for constructing expression strings. Helper class used for constructing boolean expression strings used for event notification monitors or conditional monitors.
Syntax for expression strings are as follows: 

 metric                       | Integer representing metric supported by CIMON
 condition                    | Condition supported by CIMON (see public members)
 threshold                    | Threshold value for metric. This may be an absolute
                              |    value, or relative value, depending on the condition.
 latitude                     | Geo-location latitude as float or double
 longitude                    | Geo-location longitude as float or double
 expression                   | Any valid expression: condition, AND, or OR statement 
 (OR:expression:expression)   | An OR expression
 (AND:expression:expression)  | An AND expression 
 [condition:metric:threshold] | Standard condition expression
 [condition:metric:latitude:  | Geo-location condition expression
         longitude:threshold] |

For a list of all supported metrics, their associated integer reference, the object type used for their values, and units, see Metrics. Threshold values should be of the same type as defined in Metrics.

Author:
darts
See Also:
Metrics

Constructor Detail

Conditions

public Conditions(String expression)
Construct a new expression string, using a copy of an existing expression string.

Parameters:
expression - expression string in valid format (invalid format will lead to undefined behavior when registering).

Conditions

public Conditions(int metric,
                  int condition,
                  long threshold)
Construct a new standard condition expression.

Parameters:
metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
condition - condition to trigger on (see defined constants for Conditions)
threshold - threshold value to trigger on (should be of valid type for metric)
See Also:
Metrics

Conditions

public Conditions(int metric,
                  int condition,
                  double latitude,
                  double longitude,
                  int threshold)
Construct a new geo-location condition expression.

Parameters:
metric - integer representing metric (per Metrics) to monitor
condition - condition to trigger on (see defined constants for Conditions)
latitude - latitiude for coordinate at center of monitored region
longitude - longitude for coordinate at center of monitored region
threshold - radius from coordinate defined by latitude/longitude (meters)

OrWith

public Conditions OrWith(Conditions exp)
Construct OR expression of current expression string with supplied expression string. New OR expression will be saved as current expression string.

Parameters:
exp - expression string to OR with current expression string
Returns:
current Condition object with new expression string

AndWith

public Conditions AndWith(Conditions exp)
Construct AND expression of current expression string with supplied expression string. New AND expression will be saved as current expression string.

Parameters:
exp - expression string to OR with current expression string
Returns:
current Condition object with new expression string

isLeaf

public static boolean isLeaf(int condition)
Determine if expression node is leaf node based on condition. OR and AND nodes are internal nodes of expression tree, all condition nodes are leaf nodes.

Parameters:
condition - condition for ExpressionNode
Returns:
true if ExpressionNode is leaf node in expression tree
